insert into board (B_NO, USERID, B_CONTENT, B_CREATE_DATE, B_UP_DATE, B_READCOUNT, B_OPEN, b_category, b_like) values (default, #{userid}, #{b_content}, default, default, default, #{b_open}, #{b_category}, default)
select max(B_NO) from BOARD
mapper.select: select a.atch_parent_no, a.atch_file_name from board b join boardattach a on (b.b_no = a.atch_parent_no) where b_open = 2 and atch_seq = 1 order by a.atch_parent_no desc
select a.atch_parent_no, a.atch_file_name from board b join boardattach a on (b.b_no = a.atch_parent_no) where userid = #{userid} and atch_seq = 1 order by a.atch_parent_no desc
select a.atch_parent_no, a.atch_file_name from board b join boardattach a on (b.b_no = a.atch_parent_no) where userid = #{userid} and b_open in (1,2) and atch_seq = 1 order by a.atch_parent_no desc

select a.atch_parent_no, a.atch_file_name from board b join boardattach a on (b.b_no = a.atch_parent_no) where b_open = 2 and b_category like '%' || #{tag} || '%' and atch_seq = 1 order by a.atch_parent_no desc
